text:
Wallaby Financial / Bankrate, Inc. Austin, TX and Pasadena, CA ONSITE

Pasadena: https://www.walla.by/careers Austin: http://www.creditcards.com/careers/

We build intelligent personal finance software to help you save money, earn rewards, and manage your credit for several brands such as Wallaby, CreditCards.com, and more.

Hiring for: Director, Mobile Engineer (Pasadena) ScrumMaster (Pasadena) Front End Engineers (Pasadena & Austin) QA Engineers (Pasadena) Lead Data Engineer (Austin) Web Services Engineer (Austin) Platform Engineer (Austin) Systems Engineer/Network Security (Austin)

Interview process: Apply at site and mention HackerNews. Phone screen, in person, two rounds. No trick questions, games, or gimmicks.
